<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE simplemind-mindmaps> <simplemind-mindmaps generator="SimpleMindWin32" gen-version="1.20.0" doc-version="3"> <mindmap> <meta> <guid guid="85C439FFDED64A13BCE42176B520EE51"/> <title text="quest_chapelMural" customized="True"/> <style key="system.pastel-palette"/> <auto-numbering style="disabled"/> <scrollstate zoom="100" x="740" y="275"/> <selection guid="HlO2OyyQOEeM5Cc8F9Y9hA" type="node" id="3"/> <main-centraltheme id="0"/> </meta> <topics> <topic id="0" parent="-1" guid="kW6o0OMwKEytNO54MDYHqw" x="896.02" y="620.54" palette="2" colorinfo="2" text="A Warning from the Past"> <note> version_030316_001 -First release </note> </topic> <topic id="1" parent="0" guid="leSFUphX30e2MKzK6CGNeA" x="896.01" y="722.35" palette="6" colorinfo="6" text="Collect all fragments of mural."> <note> [taskName=getMuralFragments] [itemCounter=muralFragments/9] </note> </topic> <topic id="2" parent="1" guid="ya4S48AAck6r0s8fPxgW_g" x="1373.84" y="730.62" palette="8" colorinfo="8" text="You collected all fragments of the mural."/> <topic id="3" parent="1" guid="HlO2OyyQOEeM5Cc8F9Y9hA" x="896.01" y="873.10" text="Return the mural to the chapel."> <note> [taskName=restoreMosaic] [grantRenown=5] </note> </topic> <topic id="4" parent="3" guid="WH84V2vCM0SvOM9h7XD2dw" x="1373.84" y="873.10" palette="8" colorinfo="8" text="You restored the chapel's mural,\Nrevealing a chilling scene..."/> <topic id="5" parent="0" guid="pxDv2ilCtUKVmNCBrgnTuQ" x="1373.84" y="620.54" palette="8" colorinfo="8" text="Gather every fragment of\Na fresco mural from the Bone Shore."/> </topics> <relations/> </mindmap> </simplemind-mindmaps>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE simplemind-mindmaps> <simplemind-mindmaps generator="SimpleMindWin32" gen-version="1.20.0" doc-version="3"> <mindmap> <meta> <guid guid="85C439FFDED64A13BCE42176B520EE51"/> <title text="quest_chapelMural" customized="True"/> <style key="system.pastel-palette"/> <auto-numbering style="disabled"/> <scrollstate zoom="100" x="740" y="275"/> <selection guid="HlO2OyyQOEeM5Cc8F9Y9hA" type="node" id="3"/> <main-centraltheme id="0"/> </meta> <topics> <topic id="0" parent="-1" guid="kW6o0OMwKEytNO54MDYHqw" x="896.02" y="620.54" palette="2" colorinfo="2" text="Ostrzeżenie z przeszłości"> <note> version_030316_001 -First release </note> </topic> <topic id="1" parent="0" guid="leSFUphX30e2MKzK6CGNeA" x="896.01" y="722.35" palette="6" colorinfo="6" text="Zbierz wszystkie fragmenty muralu."> <note> [taskName=getMuralFragments] [itemCounter=muralFragments/9] </note> </topic> <topic id="2" parent="1" guid="ya4S48AAck6r0s8fPxgW_g" x="1373.84" y="730.62" palette="8" colorinfo="8" text="Zebrałeś wszystkie fragmenty muralu."/> <topic id="3" parent="1" guid="HlO2OyyQOEeM5Cc8F9Y9hA" x="896.01" y="873.10" text="Odnieś mural do kaplicy."> <note> [taskName=restoreMosaic] [grantRenown=5] </note> </topic> <topic id="4" parent="3" guid="WH84V2vCM0SvOM9h7XD2dw" x="1373.84" y="873.10" palette="8" colorinfo="8" text="Odrestaurowałeś mural w kaplicy, ujawniając mrożącą krew w żyłach scenę..."/> <topic id="5" parent="0" guid="pxDv2ilCtUKVmNCBrgnTuQ" x="1373.84" y="620.54" palette="8" colorinfo="8" text="Zbierz wszystkie fragmenty muralu z Wybrzeża Kości."/> </topics> <relations/> </mindmap> </simplemind-mindmaps>
